name: Totally Broken Space Shooter
description:
This game builds and extends the good old classic Asteroids game play by mixing it up with the uncontrolled feeling of games such as flappy bird.

Your space craft has a substantial problem - you can't really move forward. Use what you know about physics to find a way how to maneuver it nevertheless and survive in the asteroid belt as long as you can.

As you do you may have to choose between shooting the enemies and retaining control over your spaceship. Shoot too much and you will go too fast and won't be able to navigate precisely and much less to aim precisely. However if you don't shoot enough your vicinity will fill with enemies threatening to take down your spacecraft once and for all.

--------------------------------------------

The assets such as the ingame sprites and the explosion prefabs are from the free assets provided for the Player26 Quark tutorial.  Sounds can be found on https://freesound.org/ and are licensed under the creative common license.
